stories.Title: Greetings from Cupertino!
stories.Description: WWDC 2023 is here, the biggest holiday for Apple fans! Find out all the updates about iOS, Mac, and the long-awaited Reality Pro AR/VR headset.
stories.Tweet: Greetings from Cupertino! 📦 WWDC 2023 is here, the biggest holiday for Apple fans! Find out all the updates about iOS, Mac, and the long-awaited Reality Pro AR/VR headset. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/06/05/wwdc-2023-news-hub-live-ios-17-headset/

stories.Title: Talk is cheap with Amazon
stories.Description: According to reports the company is in negotiations with major US carriers to offer Prime members affordable or even free phone service.
stories.Tweet: Talk is cheap with Amazon 📦 According to reports the company is in negotiations with major US carriers to offer Prime members affordable or even free phone service. #amazon https://www.engadget.com/amazon-is-reportedly-trying-to-offer-prime-subscribers-free-cell-phone-service-140026387.html

stories.Title: Generative AI is marketers' best friend
stories.Description: A recent survey by Salesforce and YouGov revealed that generative AI is transforming marketing, by saving valuable time and boosting productivity.
stories.Tweet: Generative AI is marketers' best friend 📦 A recent survey by Salesforce and YouGov revealed that generative AI is transforming marketing, by saving valuable time and boosting productivity. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/generative-ai-can-save-5-hours-of-marketing-hustle-every-week-salesforce-report/

stories.Title: AI is revolutionizing fashion design
stories.Description: CALA's AI-powered platform streamlines every step of the fashion supply chain, automating the process of bringing a garment to life and helping designers bring their visions to reality.
stories.Tweet: AI is revolutionizing fashion design 📦 CALA's AI-powered platform streamlines every step of the fashion supply chain, automating the process of bringing a garment to life and helping designers bring their visions to reality. #ai https://www.fastcompany.com/90903514/calla-ai-fashion-design-manufacture-clothes

stories.Title: A debate in the creative community
stories.Description: The recent surge of AI raises a fundamental question: Is computational creativity genuine? Can algorithms and prompts transcend human expression?
stories.Tweet: A debate in the creative community 📦 The recent surge of AI raises a fundamental question: Is computational creativity genuine? Can algorithms and prompts transcend human expression? #ai https://gizmodo.com/dall-e-chatgpt-ai-art-free-is-ai-creativity-possible-1850501473

stories.Title: More AI for your productivity
stories.Description: By introducing additional generative features for apps like Slides, Gmail, and Docs, Google is taking the AI boost a step further.
stories.Tweet: More AI for your productivity 📦 By introducing additional generative features for apps like Slides, Gmail, and Docs, Google is taking the AI boost a step further. #google https://www.androidpolice.com/google-docs-slides-gmail-new-generative-ai-features/

stories.Title: The fun side of chatbots
stories.Description: Character.ai is changing role-playing by allowing users to chat with AI-powered characters in the style of their favorite celebrities.
stories.Tweet: The fun side of chatbots 📦 Character.ai is changing role-playing by allowing users to chat with AI-powered characters in the style of their favorite celebrities. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/06/04/characterai-chatgpt-ai-chat-fun

stories.Title: From Tiangong to Earth
stories.Description: Shenzhou 15 astronauts have returned home, wrapping up their six-month mission at the Tiangong space station, as China continues to push for uninterrupted human presence in space.
stories.Tweet: From Tiangong to Earth 📦 Shenzhou 15 astronauts have returned home, wrapping up their six-month mission at the Tiangong space station, as China continues to push for uninterrupted human presence in space. #china https://www.space.com/china-shenzhou-15-astronauts-land-safely

stories.Title: Another day, another SpaceX launch
stories.Description: After several weather delays, the Dragon cargo capsule is now on its way to resupply the International Space Station. With scientific equipment and crew provisions onboard.
stories.Tweet: Another day, another SpaceX launch 📦 After several weather delays, the Dragon cargo capsule is now on its way to resupply the International Space Station. With scientific equipment and crew provisions onboard. #spacex https://www.space.com/spacex-crs-28-cargo-mission-june-2023

stories.Title: Power directly from space!
stories.Description: Caltech leads the way for a future where renewable energy knows no boundaries, with successful solar power transmission from space achieved by their SSPD-1 prototype.
stories.Tweet: Power directly from space! 📦 Caltech leads the way for a future where renewable energy knows no boundaries, with successful solar power transmission from space achieved by their SSPD-1 prototype. #science https://newatlas.com/energy/space-solar-power-transmission-test-caltech/

stories.Title: The world’s best 15-inch laptop is here
stories.Description: One of the many exciting announcements from today's WWDC is Apple's new 15-inch MacBook Air. With a sleek design that redefines portability, breakthrough M2 chip, and exceptional battery life.
stories.Tweet: The world’s best 15-inch laptop is here 📦 One of the many exciting announcements from today's WWDC is Apple's new 15-inch MacBook Air. With a sleek design that redefines portability, breakthrough M2 chip, and exceptional battery life. #apple https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/5/23739220/apple-macbook-air-15-features-specs-price-release-date-wwdc-2023

title: WWDC 2023 is here, Google adds more AI to Workspace, SpaceX launches Dragon cargo capsule
